website_summaries.verdict: The two-way Logitech Precision PC Gaming Headset delivers passable performance for a low price.
cons: Nonadjustable neckband design isn't very comfortable

customer_reviews.title: DOA
customer_reviews.text: Never got around to making a review but i got it and it was DOA from the seller and at the time it was kinda hard to get anything really done by the time i got them and tried to see if i can do anything beside buying new ones it was to late for the "Send Back" option.
customer_reviews.author: To   Ny

customer_reviews.title: The work Great!!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this gaming headset, it goes on the outside of my ears so it doesn't smash my ears against my head. This is like my third headset since they came out. I always buy the same style. So if you like to play games like Dungeons and Dragons online, or any other mmo rpg, for hours on end like I do, This headset is for you. This headset will keep your ears from hurting like crazy from being smashed against the sides of your head like other styles of headsets do. I like the sound quality too and the inline volume control as well. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Glorintina

customer_reviews.title: Painful when worn long hours
customer_reviews.text: Because the strap is on the back, it doesn't support the ear piece on your head. Instead the strap weighs down on the only thing that's keeping the headset there: the pressure from both sides! At first, it doesn't bother me but when I've worn it for 20mins, I start feeling like the world is crushing down on me.
customer_reviews.author: PepperNinja

customer_reviews.title: The mic is not good. The design is not very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The headset sits on the back of head, which is ok, however due to large ear rests it feals awkward and uncomfortable. I was not able to use volume control, as the headphones were only audible at higher volume level. The mic is poor. Whether you want it for gaming or just general purpose use, its better to skip this for something else.
customer_reviews.author: The tech

customer_reviews.title: Good headset
customer_reviews.text: I've always liked the behind the head headsets and this one is one of my favorite. It sits really well and and has great sound. it get's a little warm sometimes but that's to be expected. It does get some airflow which is nice and always stays in place.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisJ

customer_reviews.title: Has worked great for years
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a few years ago and I am just now getting around to writing a review. This thing is fantastic. It has held up to the use and abuse of a few years. It can get a little painful while wearing it over an extended time. But for the price, I would definitely get another one.
customer_reviews.author: C. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Read reviews about the Logitech headset from a few different tech sites and everyone loved them. Thought they were a adjustable fit headset but they are not. Don't care any longer. I have had trouble with headsets sitting on my ears and after awhile my ears will start to hurt. With this headset I have no issue like that and can wear them for hours on end.
customer_reviews.author: David Noonan

customer_reviews.title: Is it a CROWN?
customer_reviews.text: Yeah, it has a nice fit, but if you like to have a 10lbs helmet on then this is for you. The mic is immobile. But it looks really cool to have it on. Sound range is quiet. Tested on most applications, works, but the top of the ears hurt after a bit.
customer_reviews.author: The Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Decent Headset
customer_reviews.text: The headset is good. Sound quality is good. I personally haven't tried it on games, but my brother does and he hasn't complained about it. Microphone works just fine. One thing i don't like, but you might, is the wire. It's a bit too long it's annoying. That's about it.
customer_reviews.author: w87b

customer_reviews.title: was bent out of shape bad when i got it
customer_reviews.text: was bent out of shape bad when i got it, had to put the part that goes around the back of ur head in boiling water to form it
customer_reviews.author: Robert Rinehart

customer_reviews.title: Real quick
customer_reviews.text: The headset got here in One day real fast service and it was ground mail. Only problems with the headset was that when i talk into it, it like echos what I say but other then that it was good.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar A. Nunez

customer_reviews.title: Good headset to buy
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for more than 3 weeks and it has work fine for me, It has good volume and the mic is very good, I use it generally with skype and has work very good from speaking to hearing the other people.
customer_reviews.author: Rad

customer_reviews.title: Amazing PC Headset
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed with the quality of the device. The sound quality was outstanding, the device was comfortable, the microphone had fantastically clear quality. I was very satisfied. I would recommend this to anyone, because one size will fit all and it is definately worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: David A.

customer_reviews.title: put your head in a vice
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this headset for about 3 months and I can't stand it. The wrap around your neck puts pressure on your ears and is not comfortable. The ear cups are so large, you won't be able to wear glasses with this set on unless you rest the temples on the top of the earpiece instead of on your ear. The sound is ok and I like the volume control. I'd look elsewhere for a new headset.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bazzy

customer_reviews.title: Logitech Precision Gaming Headset
customer_reviews.text: Well I have to say I am not all that pleased with this headset. For one there is not adjustment to fit your ears. After a while of having them on, I get a headache.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Great value; the headphones get a little warm with extended use. Definitely recommend if you want a quality headset for cheap.
customer_reviews.author: TheRealDealGrabberJ

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice headset. We bought one and tried it out. Liked it enough that we bought 3 more. (I have 4 gamers in my house) Affordable. Works great with Skype, too.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Hall

customer_reviews.title: Logitech headset
customer_reviews.text: sounds great, only flaw I've found is that there is no adjustment to fit your head.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis A. Burkes

customer_reviews.title: not too happy
customer_reviews.text: This thing broke within the first 3 months of use. Very bulky and not very good. The mic boom didn't work right, and the head piece was not very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Ruthless

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones for a secondlife player
customer_reviews.text: It's a very good pair of headphones for someone who uses SecondLife alot like I do. the only problem is that on rare occasions the top of my ear gets compressed to my head and winds up hurting, but that's easy to remedy. make sure the top of your ears are sitting properly in the headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Ballinger

customer_reviews.title: Not disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality suits my purpose (for gaming) just fine. The inline volume control is a very poor design and differcult to use.
customer_reviews.author: Diehard

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Had it for about a month now and it still works and looks like new. and i bought a refurbished pair as well. the sound quality is great, by far the best I have had and the mic quality is great as well.
customer_reviews.author: Nilo Baquera

customer_reviews.title: Best cable headset I've ever had!!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great, cable was sturdy, and sounded good!! Still Have it almost a year after purchase :) Definitely love this headset.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Hovey

customer_reviews.title: FF rpg gamer
customer_reviews.text: This Headset is great for gaming whether it be Counter strike or something you dont need a mic for like Final Fantasy XI or Lineage 2. Though they arent the dome kind they still keep out quite a bit ouf the sound out. Also the space for your ears above the pad keep them from being uncomfortable. The only downfall i have about these is that they are a bit big on me but i'm a girl so it's probably different on guys.
customer_reviews.author: L. Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Simply useless if you can't wear it
customer_reviews.text: I was shocked to find that Logitech, a name I normally trust for peripherals, had created something as sloppily-designed as this headset. First, the fit was just plain atrocious. It was insanely uncomfortable, yet felt ready to fall off at any time. The other reviewer who said this was right on. (And yes, I had them on the right way!...) The sound was passable, but nothing near what I expected with the "Gaming Headset" moniker attached liberally to the packaging. Sadly, the only decent thing about it was how easy the return process was. Avoid at all costs if you wear glasses, and try to stay away even if you don't. Your ears will thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Nikhil S.

customer_reviews.title: Don't last long
customer_reviews.text: I have owned two sets of these headphones. The first one started shorting out. If I put pressure on the wire coming out, they would work. Eventually even this didn't work and they quit for good. I got another set because they were pretty much the only ones available at the store, and because I thought it might have been an isolated incident. Well, as of today, the second set is going out in the very same way. The left ear doesn't wok unless you apply pressure to the wire. I will never buy another set of Logitech headphones. Both lasted approximately 6 months. Now I am in search of a good set of gaming phones.
customer_reviews.author: S. Stipsky

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely do not buy this product.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a relatively cheap solution replace the built in microphone on my laptop and figured the headset would be an added bonus when gaming. These worked for a very limited period of time.. probably about a month before the microphone died and never worked again. I thought it was probably the mute and volume switch in the middle so after having them sit in my basement for a couple months I tried to cut it open and bypass it, no dice, don't even try.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel S. Lukens

customer_reviews.title: bad design
customer_reviews.text: These hurt my ears, and because they use pressure to stay attached to your head, they press your ears against your head when they work, and after a while, the pressure wears down, then they pull your ears down and I'm sure after a while they will just stop working, because they can't attach to your head anymore. I'm very sorry that I bought these. The microphone is very low quality too.
customer_reviews.author: Derek S. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Consider ear replacements if you use these.
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is 'ok', is what you would expect from a cheap headset. I didn't allow this to be on my head long enough to test the mic. They freak me out. After placing the ear extractors onto my head, in about 5 minutes my ears feel like they will permanently be pointed strait out to the side. After about 10 minutes they are what I would consider 'painful'. After about an hour they feel great...er that is because you went back to best buy and exchanged them for a different set. Logitech has never let me down, until now. Simply put, don't buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Nate Knight

customer_reviews.title: Very Bad Craftmanship
customer_reviews.text: Just got this item in today. First problem after plugging them in was the volume control on the chord was stuck. I had to force the thing to move. The second problem was the mic would not pick anything short of tapping the thing hard or yelling. The third problem was the right headphone was not working. I took the POS apart to discover that the right earphone was not soldered to the proper location. I will not be returning these because, I don't want Logitech to refurbish these. I want them in the trash. I also hate to say, based on what I saw, I will not purchase anything audio from them again.
customer_reviews.author: 111tribe

customer_reviews.title: Best ive had yet
customer_reviews.text: This headset is one of the most comfortable headsets ive owned. i personally prefer the behind the head style. The sound is high in quality (for the price). I go through many long sessions of gaming (sometime 7 to 8 hours long) either on CS:source or playing WoW, and some CoD. The mic is one of the best ive had as well and ive gone through my fair share of head sets and desktop mics. Its not right in your face and it pics up my voice perfectly without picing up background noise. The only drawback i see to these is that i didnt have a pair sooner =).
customer_reviews.author: Keysdiver87

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: This was useless, the mic had ZERO sensitivity, I had to literally stick the mic into my mouth and yell for it to move any of the bars on my computer sound recorder, not to mention the games i played didnt even recognize that I was talking at all. Bought this two days ago, taking it back to best buy today. Also there are just big pads on the rings, it isnt a ear encompassing headphone, it doesnt block any sounds from coming in, and I can hear wierd noises coming through the headphones when no sound is being emitted from my pc. Get somethings else.
customer_reviews.author: Hector Lomelin

customer_reviews.title: Worst headset I've ever owned ...
customer_reviews.text: The other one-star reviews are right. This headset lacks any kind of bass. There's not even a 'warm' tone. The cups for the ears also were slightly small (even wearing them correctly) and pinched the tops of my ears against my head. If you want to feel like you've got two old-school AM radios strapped to your ears, go for it. I'm returning these after five minutes of use. What a disappointment from an otherwise excellent company! Avoid at all costs.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Goddard

customer_reviews.title: Great voice sound
customer_reviews.text: So far, I don't understand the negative reviews. The headset feels a little stiff at first, but after a bit of use it should soften up. Even so, it's more comfortable already than any headset I've used. I don't use a headset for game sounds, just voice. If I'm not chatting with people, I'm using my surround speakers. The voice on this comes through wonderfully. It was loud and clear. My last set, I had to mute game sounds or turn them to bare minimum because they overrode voice. With this set I actually turned the game sounds up. And my friends said they could hear me loud and clear.
customer_reviews.author: Brenton Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: The sound is good quality, but I had a couple of issues with this headset. The microphone should be able to extend a bit, as few software packages could hear my voice very well, and when it did, it picked up too much other noise. The fact that it is designed to go behind your head was a bit uncomfortable. Other headsets that are designed for that angle are lighter, while this one is still a bit heavy, and tends to move down from a comfortable position. It's a good headset, but just not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Paul A. DAigle

customer_reviews.title: DON'T GO HERE!
customer_reviews.text: Within 5 minutes of opening the box to this poorly constructed headset, the microphone dangled loosely from its housing, the cheap plastic conector having broken. The pads on the earpieces fell off and were very difficult to put back on, frustrating and very annoying to say the least. Returned to the store from which they came the next day. Only wish I could give them a zero rating. My opinion of this, and many other Logitech products,----yech!
customer_reviews.author: Richard The Lionheart

customer_reviews.title: great gaming headset
customer_reviews.text: this headset is great for gaming, extra large earphone cushions make extended play very comfortable and relaxing. do not strain or pinch the ears in any way, shape or form. buy these headphones if you are not only concerned about your gaming sound, but concerned about your gaming hair : they wrap around the back for the ultimate in hair preservation. Five Stars all the way. Do not waste your money Sennheiser or Plantronics go with this cheap and highly effective solution.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew J. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Nice headset for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I have had these now for about 6 months and I really enjoy them. The extra padding is a plus as it covers the whole ear. The sound quality is excellent. I use these while playing online games like Battlefield 2 where communication is key. It took a week or so to break them in as they felt tight at first but now they are very comfortable. I recommend these to anyone who plays online games that require 2-way communication, those who use a communication service like Skype or just wish to listen to music. Great overall value!
customer_reviews.author: G.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible fit
customer_reviews.text: I play quite a few online games and use TS with friends. I bought these at BB and immediately regretted it. The fit is horrible; after playing for an hour or more, my ears hurt from the fit. The fit also prevents the sound quality. I'm now happy that my cat has chewed through the cord so that I have to go out and buy a new pair. =)
customer_reviews.author: J. Chomicki

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable and does not sound good at all.
customer_reviews.text: After wearing these things for maybe 5-10 minutes they are very uncomfortable. The large padding around the outside does little to help with comfort. They sound like listening through a pringles can. I tried using these with Counter-Strike: Source, and the gun shots sounded like hi-pitched firecrackers. Very annoying. I returned these and picked up a Altec Lansing headset and mic for $10 more. Much happier with it.
customer_reviews.author: Angry Pickle

customer_reviews.title: Eh...
customer_reviews.text: Alright for a cheap headset its worth it. since logitech built it the quality is there but since its cheap it blows at the same time... Talking through it is crystal from what people tell me. But listening through it blows by far. 1 the headset is one size. With it being 1 size its shaped horribly. Pretty much. If you need a headset buy it... but if you don't need it right now I would suggest spending an extra 10 bucks for a better one.
customer_reviews.author: A. Chiappetta

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I have Ventrilo program and when ever I connect to it using the mic part of it, my friends tell me they hear nothing but static. since there are no drivers that I can download, these will not be getting used by me. Your better off going for the cheaper brand.
customer_reviews.author: R. Faber

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I'm guessing that these other people are comparing this headset to the really high end $200+ headsets. I think that this headset is great. My friends were impressed by the sound quality of my voice over Skype and I was impressed by the sound quality of the headphones when playing Modern Warfare 2. After 5 hours of straight game play my ears were a little sore but I didn't see this as a big problem.
customer_reviews.author: crumps589

customer_reviews.title: Pass on these. . .
customer_reviews.text: On the plus side, they worked. . . on the down side, everything else. Uncomfortable, and everyone in the room hears them even if the volume is low. Did I mention uncomfortable? These also take up a ton of room in a drawer. Definitely pass on these!
customer_reviews.author: Long

customer_reviews.title: disappointing
customer_reviews.text: These things immediataly begin to hurt my ears physically. Lazy, I kept them hoping to get adjusted to the fit. I did, and I was satisfied with the sound overall. Then 4 months into using them frequently (1-3 hrs. a day) the right speaker went out, and it's obvious the wiring that connected to the headset is faulty.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Decent Sound, Good Mic, but it doesn't matter because...
customer_reviews.text: this thing is the most uncomfortable headphones I've ever put on. How does Logitech think that a "one size fits all" headset will work? I cannot wear this thing for longer than 30 minutes without my ears turning red and hurting.
customer_reviews.author: R. Dickstein

customer_reviews.title: Sound Quality Does Not Outshine Discomfort
customer_reviews.text: I'll keep it short: Sounds great, fits terribly for long gaming sessions. It's behind the neck design means the headset's weight is resting on the top of your ears, which begin to hurt after an hour or so, and it clamps to stay there. For long gaming sessions, get a headset with a headstrap, not behind the neck.
customer_reviews.author: Alex J. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Whoever designed this headset should be fired immediately. They're constantly falling off my face and feel very cheap. You can't even adjust the band and whoever thought it should go in the back is not the brightest.
customer_reviews.author: Kira

customer_reviews.title: Lasted for two months
customer_reviews.text: I expected much better quality for a Logitech product. The headset is very harsh on your ears after wearing it for more than a hour. The boom is not adjustable and does not pick up my voice well at all. The worst part of it was that the mic stopped working after two months. I am very disappointed with Logitech and will stay away from their headset products in the future.
customer_reviews.author: GaryUSC

customer_reviews.title: The first two reviews are right on the money
customer_reviews.text: Everything those guys said are right on! Poor quality, and they feel like lead sinkers atttached to your ears. The audio bleeds into the microphone in Teamspeak. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: J. Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: This is a great headset. Sounds are crisp and the mic is extremely clear. I have two sound cards. One for a 5.1 speaker system and one for the headset. With the open ear design, I can listen to both. I would recommend this headset to anyone who likes to play online games or just simple chatting.
customer_reviews.author: yakfisherman

customer_reviews.title: Terrible headset!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this headset, looking to replace an old pair of headphones. The sound is muffled, the microphone is weak, and sound I'm listening to bleeds through so other people can hear it over my mic. Certainly not a product I'd buy again, waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Ottergame

customer_reviews.title: it is not how i expected
customer_reviews.text: in fact this headphone is good qualified but the problem is uncomfortable. in one hour it make my ears painful and the bad thing is head band goes around almost from backneck..anyway i still use it but it depends on for what purpose u gonna use it ...
customer_reviews.author: Fatih M. Araz

customer_reviews.title: Don't listen to them.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are great. I the mic works great, it picks up every sound. The only reason I didn't give it five stars is because it does get a little bit uncomfortable after like hours of use, but the price is good and I like them.
customer_reviews.author: napoleon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these headphones at the end of July 2006 and since then they've been very handy. They don't hurt at all, and the sound pickup is good too. I give this product an A+
customer_reviews.author: Jawn Dough

customer_reviews.title: Good headset.
customer_reviews.text: Headset is great for the price, sound and mic quality are good for the headset. Some may find it a bit uncomfortable to wear for extended periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: Colin B. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: These headsets do not have the best sound in the world but are good enough, and are confortable too, at least for me...
customer_reviews.author: Cesar Penaherrera

customer_reviews.title: Low sound quality
customer_reviews.text: It was disappionting to hear my music and games in this bad set of earphones. Logitech should take care where to put your brand name.
customer_reviews.author: David R. Rueda Vicente

customer_reviews.title: Don't get these.
customer_reviews.text: Headset broke long before it should have. Very disappointed be it seemed very durable. Fairly comfortable but awkward.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Christensen

customer_reviews.title: good handset
customer_reviews.text: this is very good handset I have, come with very long cable, and the sond is good. Thanks logitech.
customer_reviews.author: Z. zhou

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this headset when it first came out from my friend who runs a computer store. They had great sound, Great fit, and a great mic. The only problem I have with it now is I bent it out of shape when it was on my chair and I didnt see it and sat on it but I am thinking of buying it again now.
customer_reviews.author: Epic

customer_reviews.title: Not good.
customer_reviews.text: This item of Logitech is not that good. 1 star from me. Am not satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Arif Hossain

customer_reviews.title: Logitech Precision PC Gaming Headset
customer_reviews.text: This item is perfect for gaming and even for chating online.
customer_reviews.author: Prvoslav Jovanovic

product_meta.title: Logitech Precision PC Gaming Headset
product_meta.description:
Color:GreyMODEL- 980231 VENDOR- LOGITECH INC. FEATURES- Precision PC Gaming Headset Unique open air design is easy on the ears and stays cool in the heat of the action. Ratchet Boom Placement allows you to precisely adjust your booom for optimal positioning. 40mm Neodymium stereo drivers let you experience excellent audio clarity in your games. In-line volume & mute for rapid access to headset volume and microphone mute. Noise-canceling microphone blocks background noise for ultimate voice commands. -- SPECIFICATIONs -- SENSITIVITY --58 dBV/uBar -38 dBV/Pa +/-4dB FREQUENCY RESPONSE- Headset : 20

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Taunt your opponents. Coordinate teammates. Issue commands. With the Logitech Precision PC Gaming Headset, the full power of voice is now in your control. You won't believe the comfort, convenience, and quality… especially during intense online battles. 

 

 * Unique open-air design: Keep cool and comfortable even in the heat of the action. 
 * Ratchet boom placement: Precisely adjust your boom for optimal positioning at all times. 
 * Large, 40mm neodymium stereo drivers: Experience excellent audio clarity in your games. 
 * In-line volume and mute controls: Quickly access headset volume control and microphone mute. 
 * Noise-canceling microphone: Block background noise for ultimate voice command.
feature_bullets: Response Bandwidth - Headset: 20 Hz - 20 kHz; Microphone: 100 Hz - 16 kHz

specifications.Customer Reviews: 2.8 out of 5 stars103 ratings2.8 out of 5 stars
